name: Don't Take it Lightly
description:
Don’t take it lightly 

Sam inherited their grandfather Edgar’s mansion after his recent passing, but what Sam could not predict was that Edgar was also haunting it! In this spooky co-operative puzzle game, help Sam and Edgar solve the mysteries of the mansion to set Edgar free from the curse that’s bound him to this place.  

Play as Sam and Edgar and use your individual abilities to navigate through the rooms and solve a series of light-based puzzles in order to find the source of the curse. One player uses a keyboard and the other uses a controller. 

Controls 

Keyboard  

Move – W, A, S, D 

Interact – E 

Pause menu – ESC  

Controller (Xbox) 

Move – Left stick 

Interact – A 

Pause menu – Start
